record.field: ComfyUI is an advanced node-based UI for Stable Diffusion. It provides a powerful interface for creating complex AI image generation workflows with a focus on customization and control.

{ "website": "https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI", "founded": 2022, "key_features": [ "Node-based UI for AI Image Generation", "Stable Diffusion Integration", "Custom Workflow Creation", "Advanced Control over Generation Parameters", "Extensible Plugin System" ] }
